text: I've got the Chronos on underneath this
ordinary watch and you can barely tell
it's there although it does raise up
your watch a little bit although they've
kept it as thin as possible by putting
in wireless charging and there are some
basic interactions too so I can tap the
watch to skip my music or take a photo
in the camera well let's talk to the
co-founder mark there's no screen on
this device no voice control will that
limit how useful it is we worked really
hard on figuring out what is the most
useful thing to have on your wrist and
we distilled all these different options
down to what we think of the critical
things for people what we think you
should get on your wrist is really only
a handful of your favorite people and
then a couple of your favorite
applications when you're getting your
notifications it's just the things you
care about
